name: Cult Simulator
description:
This small town is about to be abducted by aliens. Convince all the townspeople to join your alien-believing cult so that they can survive the alien invasion!

Cult Simulator is a relaxed, low stress game for gamers who would rather talk to townspeople than shoot enemies. It is a quick web based game for when you have a bit of downtime. Nostalgic graphics and music, funny dialog, and easy controls.

Controls: Arrow keys and spacebar to interact.

"This game is great!" - Joe Z

"The music is fun and nostalgic" - Ashley K

"This game deserves the highest honors!" - My parents
